timeline.message:
Duplicate Condition in Resolve

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: perhaps it was supposed to be contained != null &&  contained.getId() != null
timeline.author: punktilious

replies.bodyText: It is impossible for contained to be null in this context. Likely this was supposed to be contained.getId() != null && id != null but it is also impossible for id to be null in this context.
replies.author: JohnTimm
